steps.title: 1. Mandatory Requirements
steps.text:
Before starting, validate these items:
â€¢ Active Tax ID/Business License.
â€¢ Phone Number: Must not have an active WhatsApp account. If it does, delete it in Settings > Account > Delete account.
â€¢ Credit Card: Required for Meta billing.

steps.title: 2. Business Manager
steps.text:
1. Access Meta Business Manager.
2. If you don't have an account, click 'Create account'.
3. Use real company data and your corporate email.

steps.title: 3. Integration App
steps.text:
1. Go to developers.facebook.com.
2. Click 'Create App'.
3. Choose 'Business'.
4. Name the app after your company.

steps.title: 4. Configure WhatsApp
steps.text:
1. In your app dashboard, click 'Set up' on the WhatsApp product.
2. Link the app to the business account created in step 2.
3. Go to 'API Setup' in the side menu.

steps.title: 5. API Setup and IDs
steps.text:
1. In 'API Setup', you will see the Phone Number ID and WhatsApp Business Account ID.
2. Add your number and verify via SMS.
3. Copy these IDs; they are essential for the integration.

steps.title: 6. Generate Permanent Token
steps.text:
VERY IMPORTANT: The temporary token expires in 24h. To keep the system running:
1. Go to Business Settings > System Users.
2. Generate a New Token, select your App, and check the whatsapp_business_messaging permission.
3. Copy the generated token.
